snippet: The left-hander Boone Logan and the Yankees agreed to a one-year, $3.15 million contract, a raise of $1.25 million, avoiding salary arbitration.
lead_paragraph: The left-hander Boone Logan and the Yankees agreed to a one-year, $3.15 million contract, a raise of $1.25 million, avoiding salary arbitration.

headline.seo: Boone Logan and Yankees Agree to Contract and Avoid Arbitration
headline.main: Logan and Yankees Agree to Deal and Avoid Arbitration
